articles.title: Kyiv missile strikes: Tracking the rise of Russian attacks - BBC
articles.description: Russia is mounting more frequent missile and drone raids on Ukraine recently, with a focus on Kyiv.
articles.content:
The Ukrainian capital Kyiv has been repeatedly hit by missiles and drones over the past few weeks. Most of the attacks come at night.
In central Kyiv, Nataliya Lyashchenko has lost count of the numb… [+4082 chars]

articles.title: Webb Telescope Spots Water Plume '20 Times the Size of the Moon' Erupting From Enceladus - IGN
articles.description: The golden eye of the James Webb Space Telescope has spotted a 6,000 mile long plume of water erupting from the Saturnian moon Enceladus.
articles.content:
The James Webb Space Telescope has spotted a 6,000 mile-long plume of frozen water erupting from vast crevasses in the surface of the Saturnian moon Enceladus.
